name: Froslass ex
author: 5ban Graphics
tera_effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).

abilities.name: Evanescent
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out, flip a coin. If heads, your opponent takes 1 fewer Prize card.

attacks.name: Frost Bullet
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
